data.title: Roger Martin du Gard and Maumort: The Nobel Laureate and His Unfinished Creation 9780875807492
data.meta_description: In the late 1930s and early 1940s, Roger Martin du Gard was one of the most famous writers in the Western world. Initially, the novel is an account of the French experience during World War II and the German occupation as seen through the eyes of a retired army officer.
data.text: Will ship within 10 business days of receiving cleared payment. The seller has specified an extended handling time for this item.
